analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single‐file component that renders an SVG “add” (plus in circle) icon with a configurable stroke color.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable Add icon for navigation or action buttons across the application.

Components.name: IconAdd
Components.responsibility: Renders an SVG plus symbol inside a circle, accepts a `fill` prop to set stroke color.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Defines component props in the `<script setup>` block.

fill.description: Stroke color for the SVG path.

analysis.Usage:
Import and use in templates or other components:

```vue
<script setup>
import IconAdd from 'modules/icons/navigation/IconAdd.vue'
</script>
<template>
  <IconAdd fill="#ff0000" />
</template>
```
Notes: There is no custom JavaScript logic or lifecycle hooks beyond prop definition.
Default fill uses CSS var `--black` to inherit theme color.
No scoped or global styles are defined in this file.
SVG attributes (`stroke-width`, `stroke-linecap`, `stroke-linejoin`) are hardcoded for consistent rendering.
